text: What is a good PDF report generator tool for python?
What is a good tool for PDF report generation in Python?
I've checked out ReportLab, but it seems to be awfully low-level for what I want to do.

My current hunch is to call TeX on the command-line and let it produce the PDF, but if there is something that is easier to work with (and looks professional - We'll send this to customers) I'd very much like a prod in the right direction.
